title: 'builtin_function_or_method' object has no attribute 'fft' ('torch_skcuda' backend)
body:
Same error with either install: `pip install git+https://github.com/kymatio/kymatio.git@master` `pip install git+https://github.com/edouardoyallon/kymatio.git@torch17`
code + output ```python import numpy as np import torch import cupy import kymatio from kymatio.torch import Scattering1D _ = [print(m.__name__, m.__version__) for m in (np, torch, cupy, kymatio)] x = np.random.randn(1024) T = x.shape[-1] J = 6 Q = 16 scattering = Scattering1D(J, T, Q, backend='torch_skcuda') xt = torch.as_tensor(x) Scx = scattering(xt) ``` ``` numpy 1.18.5 torch 1.7.1 cupy 8.3.0 kymatio 0.3.dev0 Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\untitled10.py", line 19, in Scx = scattering(xt) File "D:\Anaconda\envs\pyt\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 727, in _call_impl result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs) File "D:\Anaconda\envs\pyt\lib\site-packages\kymatio\frontend\torch_frontend.py", line 23, in forward return self.scattering(x) File "D:\Anaconda\envs\pyt\lib\site-packages\kymatio\scattering1d\frontend\torch_frontend.py", line 121, in scattering out_type=self.out_type) File "D:\Anaconda\envs\pyt\lib\site-packages\kymatio\scattering1d\core\scattering1d.py", line 78, in scattering1d U_0_hat = fft(U_0, 'C2C') File "D:\Anaconda\envs\pyt\lib\site-packages\kymatio\backend\base_backend.py", line 58, in __call__ return self.fft_forward(x, direction=direction, inverse=inverse) File "D:\Anaconda\envs\pyt\lib\site-packages\kymatio\backend\base_backend.py", line 53, in fft_forward output = self.fft(x) File "D:\Anaconda\envs\pyt\lib\site-packages\kymatio\scattering1d\backend\torch_backend.py", line 134, in fft = FFT(lambda x: torch.view_as_real(torch.fft.fft(torch.view_as_complex(x))), AttributeError: 'builtin_function_or_method' object has no attribute 'fft' ```
